thread.section_title: Omega Rental Cars Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Omega Rental Cars | omegarentalcars.com
thread.title: Amiria Reriti
thread.title_full: Omega Rental Cars reviewed by Amiria Reriti

author: Amiria Reriti
title: Amiria Reriti
text: Even though I had ticked all the relevant information of arrival and departure times etc as per the online template - the resulting contract that was automatically produced had different dates and arrival times. The rep who met us at the Wellington airport couldn't explain why that was but he had sent off a report to the 'Tech' people as wasn't sure why that happened but the result to us was that we needed to re-confirm with the pick up rep again the correct information as the contract was going to be more costly than planned. Not a biggie, but would insist on checking the contract and not rely on the automated transfer of information from one process to the next.
